function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Uncertain prognoses and severe shortages of resources for testing and treatment","category":"","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Imposition of unfamiliar public health measures that infringe on personal freedoms","category":"","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conflicting messages from authorities","category":"","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Physical distancing guidelines based on country may vary, leading to confusion and inconsistency in implementation.","category":"","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining physical distancing between partners and roommates in small apartments increase the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of outdoor spaces for socialization and physical distancing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation and indoor environmental quality","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of natural ventilation in bedrooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to restorative spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate thermal comfort in living spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation and indoor air quality in apartment housing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate spatial variety and privacy in apartment units","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper separation for multi-functional spaces in apartment layouts","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate space for physical distancing in communal areas of apartment buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and daylighting in apartment units","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on elevators in high-rise residential buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of space for self-isolation in shared apartments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing health and safety protocols in shared apartment housing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate affordable housing for self-isolation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity increases the likelihood of disease transmission, especially in shared dwellings and apartment housing.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental and physical health issues due to poor living conditions and lack of physical distancing within shared dwellings.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of surface transmission within apartment buildings due to high-touch surfaces and communal spaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to private balconies in housing for the elderly in high-rise residential buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate support for physical distancing in balcony designs","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of outdoor green spaces in urban apartment buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on active heating and cooling systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation in balconies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncontrolled socialization on balconies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal access to daylight, nature, and thermal comfort due to socioeconomic status","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High co2 levels, mold, and poor indoor air quality in social housing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Outbreak of covid-19 in a high-rise apartment building due to unknown cause","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in areas with ideal temperature and humidity for airborne transfer","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residents in buildings with high exterior glazing reporting higher thermal discomfort and health issues","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupant discomfort in apartment housing due to thermal conditions and iaq","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social interaction due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased time spent in the bedroom not sleeping, but engaging in activities like watching movies or using social media, which can be problematic for resident well-being.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exterior city noise pollution in apartment housing as a source of annoyance that prevents restful sleep.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate daylighting and lack of regulation of human circadian clock due to poor environmental design in residential spaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor mental health due to lack of physical activity and social interactions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disrupted sleep during times of crisis , covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate bedroom design impacting sleep quality","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in apartment design may not effectively mitigate the spread of contagious diseases, leading to increased transmission risk.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate circadian regulation due to poor design of bedrooms, leading to negative impacts on sleep quality and overall health.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear optimal light levels for each room can lead to dissatisfaction with lighting conditions, impacting resident housing.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor thermal conditions and iaq greatly affect occupant health and
